mapper.insert: insert into checkapply (id, Name, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update checkapply set Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Medical_Id = #{medicalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Creation_Time = #{creationTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Total_Sum = #{totalSum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Objective = #{objective,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Invoice_Number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, Name, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark from checkapply where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, Name, Medical_Id, Creation_Time, Total_Sum, Objective, User_Id, state, Invoice_Number, DelMark from checkapply
